about_the_game:
Gulping Snake is a 2D puzzle game inspired by classic snake games. Become a snake and eat all the apples on the screen!

Features

  • A total 40 levels
  • Various gimmicks such as ice, button, anti-apple, turn item, duplicate item, etc.
  • Supports the undo feature
  • 1~4 hours play time
detailed_description:
Gulping Snake is a 2D puzzle game inspired by classic snake games. Become a snake and eat all the apples on the screen!

Features

  • A total 40 levels
  • Various gimmicks such as ice, button, anti-apple, turn item, duplicate item, etc.
  • Supports the undo feature
  • 1~4 hours play time

name: Gulping snake

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1030
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1030
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

short_description: Gulping Snake is a simple, but not easy, 2D puzzle game.
